text: evar tam iraivanukku payapaktiyutan natantu kontarkalo avarkal kuttankuttamaka cuvarkkattinpal kontu varappatuvarkal; anku avarkal vantatum, atan vacalkal tirakkappatum; atan kavalarkal avarkalai nokki"unkal mitu canti untakattum, ninkal manam perravarkal; enave atil piraveciyunkal; enrenrum atil tankivitunkal" (enru avarkalitam kurappatum)
